alert.note: Alert for Columbia; McDuffie; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 8:06PM EDT until June 06 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern McDuffie County in east central Georgia... Central Columbia County in east central Georgia... Richmond County in east central Georgia... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 806 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Thomson, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... North Augusta, Grovetown, Evans, Thomson, Martinez, Fort Gordon, Augusta, Hephzibah, Harlem, Appling, Glendale, South Augusta, Midtown, Summerville, Augusta Mall, Daniel Field, Augusta Regional Airport, Village Plaza Shopping Center, Augusta National Golf Club and McBean. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 172 and 201. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 1 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
